alias.send:
t = { fruit = "apple", vegetable = "potato", spice = "pepper", herb = "parsley", } result = utils.multilistbox ( "Choose a food", "Foods ...", t, {fruit = true, spice = true } )
if result then print (string.rep ("=", 10)) print "result = " tprint (result) print (string.rep ("-", 10)) end
if result then print ("You chose:") for k in pairs (result) do print (k, " = ", t [k]) end -- for else print "Nothing chosen" end -- if
